scripts.dev: cross-env-shell "MEDUSA_ENV=${MEDUSA_ENV:-host}; ENV_FILE=${ENV_FILE:-./.env.host.local}; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then ENV_FILE=./.env.host; fi; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then ENV_FILE=./.env; fi; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then echo 'Missing env file (.env.host.local, .env.host or .env)'; exit 1; fi; MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS=\"--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node\" ENV_FILE=$ENV_FILE MEDUSA_ENV=$MEDUSA_ENV medusa develop"
scripts.start: cross-env-shell "MEDUSA_ENV=${MEDUSA_ENV:-host}; ENV_FILE=${ENV_FILE:-./.env.host.local}; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then ENV_FILE=./.env.host; fi; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then ENV_FILE=./.env; fi; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then echo 'Missing env file (.env.host.local, .env.host or .env)'; exit 1; fi; MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS=\"--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node\" ENV_FILE=$ENV_FILE MEDUSA_ENV=$MEDUSA_ENV medusa start"
scripts.migrate: cross-env-shell "MEDUSA_ENV=${MEDUSA_ENV:-host}; ENV_FILE=${ENV_FILE:-./.env.host.local}; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then ENV_FILE=./.env.host; fi; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then ENV_FILE=./.env; fi; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then echo 'Missing env file (.env.host.local, .env.host or .env)'; exit 1; fi; MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS=\"--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node\" ENV_FILE=$ENV_FILE medusa db:migrate"
scripts.seed: cross-env-shell "MEDUSA_ENV=${MEDUSA_ENV:-host}; ENV_FILE=${ENV_FILE:-./.env.host.local}; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then ENV_FILE=./.env.host; fi; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then ENV_FILE=./.env; fi; if [ ! -f $ENV_FILE ]; then echo 'Missing env file (.env.host.local, .env.host or .env)'; exit 1; fi; MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js medusa exec ./scripts/seed.cjs ${npm_config_file:-./data/seed.json}"
scripts.seed:admin: cross-env MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node" medusa user -e admin@example.com -p supersecret
scripts.services: docker compose -f ../../infrastructure/docker-compose.yml up -d db redis backend
scripts.seed:services: docker compose -f ../../infrastructure/docker-compose.yml exec backend pnpm run seed
